isys::IFileSystem Class Reference
Defines access to operating system dependent implementation

Defines some file system dependent operations. More...

#include <IFileSystem.h>

Detailed Description

Defines some file system dependent operations.

virtual bool isys::IFileSystem::CreateFileCopy ( const QString &  inputFile,
const QString &  outputFile,
bool  overwriteExisting = false 
) const [pure virtual]

Copy any file to another.

If the overwriteExisting is set on, the existing file will be overwritten.

Implemented in iqt::CFileSystem.

virtual bool isys::IFileSystem::CreateFolder ( const QString &  directoryPath) const [pure virtual]

Create an empty directory.

Implemented in iqt::CFileSystem.

virtual QString isys::IFileSystem::GetBaseFileName ( const QString &  filePath) const [pure virtual]

Get base file name (also without extension) of specified file path.

For example for "C:\Test\blah.txt.gz" it should return "blah".

Implemented in iqt::CFileSystem.

virtual QString isys::IFileSystem::GetDirPath ( const QString &  filePath) const [pure virtual]

Get directory path of specified file path.

For example for "C:\Test\blah.txt" it should return "C:\Test".

Implemented in iqt::CFileSystem.

Referenced by ibase::TFileSerializerComp< ReadArchive, WriteArchive >::CheckTargetDirectory().

virtual QString isys::IFileSystem::GetFileName ( const QString &  filePath) const [pure virtual]

Get file name of specified file path.

For example for "C:\Test\blah.txt" it should return "blah.txt".

Implemented in iqt::CFileSystem.

virtual QString isys::IFileSystem::GetNormalizedPath ( const QString &  path) const [pure virtual]

Get normalized file path.

For any path to the same file this function should return the same path. For example for "C:\Test\..\Test\blah.txt" it should return "C:\Test\blah.txt".

Implemented in iqt::CFileSystem.

const QString &  extension 
) const [pure virtual]

virtual bool isys::IFileSystem::RemoveFile ( const QString &  filePath) const [pure virtual]

Remove the file filePath from the file system.

Implemented in iqt::CFileSystem.

virtual bool isys::IFileSystem::RemoveFolder ( const QString &  directoryPath,
bool  ignoreNonEmpty = false 
) const [pure virtual]

Remove the directory directoryPath from the file system.

If ignoreNonEmpty flag set, all files in the directory will be also deleted, otherwise operation will be canceled and the function returns false.

Implemented in iqt::CFileSystem.
